instruction: any funny teen movies about high school and awkward romance?
output: If you're up for some classic teen awkwardness and hilarious high school antics, you gotta check out American Pie Presents: The Book of Love! 😆📚 It's all about those goofy, clueless moments when trying to figure out love and, well, a lot more. Perfect for a fun, laugh-out-loud night!
